meanings: Noun 층계형 출입구(들판의 울타리·문 등을 타고 오르내릴 수 있도록 만든 것)

vlive.korean: 이건 역삼 스타일~ 오케이? This is Yeoksam Style! Okay? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
각자의 스타일을 얘기해주세요! Please explain each of your styles. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: Please explain each of your styles.

vlive.korean: 나도 먹... - 내 스타일이야 - 나도 먹어볼게~ I... - It's my style. - I'll eat it, too. 듣기 View video TWICE : 트와이스 복자매 나모의 “도전! ASMR” EP.01
vlive.english: I... - It's my style. - I'll eat it, too.

vlive.korean: [고양이 스타일(?)로 꾸밀 예정] 그래서 좀 고양이로... [Planning to decorate them in a cat style(?)] I'm going to use cats... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] “트둥’s 귀염뽀짝 폴라로이드 꾸미기” (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [Planning to decorate them in a cat style(?)] I'm going to use cats...

vlive.korean: 약간 제 스타일... It's my style... 듣기 View video GOT7 : 주말 유겸이

examples.korean: Their music blends traditional and modern styles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 음악은 전통적인 스타일과 현대적인 스타일을 조합하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their music blends traditional and modern styles. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This latest collection lacks style and originality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이번 최신 컬렉션은 스타일과 독창성이 부족하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This latest collection lacks style and originality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His style of dressing bespoke great self-confidence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 옷 입는 스타일은 자신감이 대단함을 보여주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His style of dressing bespoke great self-confidence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: the new style of politician, typified by the Prime Minister 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수상으로 대표되는, 새로운 스타일의 정치가 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the new style of politician, typified by the Prime Minister Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The car has been criticized for its outdated body styling. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 자동차는 차체 디자인[스타일]이 구식이라고 비판을 받아 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car has been criticized for its outdated body styling. Add to Wordbook
